argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pntrval.r | |- R = ( a e. RR+ |-> ( ( psi ` a ) - a ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( a = A -> ( psi ` a ) = ( psi ` A ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( a = A -> a = A ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( a = A -> ( ( psi ` a ) - a ) = ( ( psi ` A ) - A ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( psi ` A ) - A ) e. _V |
| 6 | 4, 1, 5 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( R ` A ) = ( ( psi ` A ) - A ) ) |
